full_threads.body: @glen please action this in the new ticket https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2970874067/156736. Thanks!

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Just following on from this, if you could do the same with the Princeville page updates, that would be great and I can provide better wording for these templates.

Finally, the Pathzero section should be a tombstone in line with the B Corp Certification, Responsible Investment Policy and Climate Tech Investments sections.

Please see the screenshot below for what it currently looks like.



Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Rica,

Thanks for this! Apologies for the confusion, but would it be possible for you to save down the changes you have made to the investments section as a draft for now rather than including on the public website? Only reason is that I need to confirm with my bosses that they are happy with the wording as sometimes deal transaction details can be sensitive.

It would then be great if you could share the screenshots of what the tombstones would look like, and then I can show my bosses, who may have comments.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Finlay, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://privatuscp.com/investments/
https://privatuscp.com/princeville/
https://privatuscp.com/esg/

Regarding the following:
Personnel Updates
  • Richard Gibb has been saved as a draft for now. We're just waiting on his image and bio to complete the update.
Miscellaneous Updates
  • The year references across the site have been updated as discussed.
  • I wasn't able to locate where to update the "~A$250m Assets Under Management" and the "150 investors" figures. If you could point me to the correct section or provide further context, I’ll take care of it right away.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Quick note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia changed the customer to Finlay Campbell
Glen Tenorio assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Thanks Finlay.

Adding in @Wolf IQ Support who will take care of these updates and confirm once done.

We'll also stand by for feedback from Karen too.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 12, 2025 at 3:57 PM Finlay Campbell <finlay@privatuscp.com> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Thanks for your time this afternoon.

Please find below a list of the investments we would like to add to update the website:

Privatus Capital Fund Investments

  • Co-invested at part of Alceon's acquisition of its 50% stake of Boss Engineering in April 2024, valuing Boss at ~A$170m
    • https://www.afr.com/street-talk/alceon-pe-signs-on-dotted-line-for-boss-engineering-citi-in-for-debt-20240404-p5fhjs
  • Co-invested alongside Glow Capital Partners in their investment in Foil Drive in February 2025, where Privatus provided high-quality advice during the diligence process
    • https://www.afr.com/street-talk/making-waves-glow-capital-invests-in-water-sports-electrification-biz-20250211-p5lbak
  • Co-invested alongside Glow Capital Partners in their follow-on investment in Ecommerce Equation in January 2025, reflecting Privatus' excellent portfolio management solutions during the 1st year of the hold period for Glow

Princeville Capital - Assets to Add

  • Day One - Chinese Data Centers located across key markets including Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Bangkok, Hong Kong and Tokyo
    • https://dayonedc.com/
  • Claroty - A cybersecurity company specializing in prodcting cyber-physical stems across various sectors, headquartered in New York
    • https://claroty.com/

ESG Updates

  • Pathzero relationship
    • Pathzero provides carbon accounting and offsetting options for companies and funds in the private capital space
    • Each year, Privatus purchases carbon credits to offset its emissions
    • https://pathzero.com/

Miscellaneous Updates

  • ~A$250m Assets Under Management
  • 200+ Years Experience
  • 150 investors

Personnel Updates

  • Richard Gibb - Senior Adviser (headshot and biography can be provided)


Let me revert back once I have discussed with Karen. We have opened an Asian office in Singapore in the last 6-12 months, and I think it could be useful to have a page dedicated to them too.

Thanks again,

Finlay


Finlay Campbell
Analyst

M +61 416 718 923
E finlay@privatuscp.com
